referencedBy.comment: A party that is authorized to perform an activity in this trade country sub-division.
A party representing another party for this exchanged document.
A party associated with this trade party, such as a local agent of a shipping line.
The carrier agent trade party for this logistics transport movement.
A carrier party for this line trade agreement.
A certifying party for this transport event.
The claim related party for this financial adjustment.
The commodity consolidator agent party for this logistics transport movement.
The commodity consolidator party for this logistics transport movement.
A connecting carrier party for this supply chain consignment.
The party authorized to act for or on behalf of the consignee for this supply chain consignment.
The consignee party for this referenced supply chain consignment.
The party authorized to act for or on behalf of the consignor for this supply chain consignment.
The consignor party for this referenced supply chain consignment.
The party responsible for the consolidation of this supply chain consignment.
A consortium carrier party for this logistics transport movement.
The coverage party for this transport cargo insurance.
The party acting as an agent for, or on behalf of, the consignor with respect to the customs export procedures for this supply chain consignment.
The party acting as an agent for, or on behalf of, the consignee with respect to the customs import procedures for this supply chain consignment.
The party acting as an agent for, or on behalf of, the consignor with respect to customs transit procedures for this supply chain consignment.
The party responsible for providing the dangerous goods notification in accordance with the dangerous goods regulations relevant for this supply chain consignment.
The party responsible for the deconsolidation of this supply chain consignment.
The party to whom this referenced supply chain consignment will be or has been delivered.
The party from whom this referenced supply chain consignment will be or has been despatched.
A party to be notified of the documentary instructions for this logistics transport movement.
The party who exports this supply chain consignment.
A freight forwarder party, at header level, for this trade delivery.
A grouping centre party for this supply chain consignment.
The trade party authorized to issue the International Ship Security Certificate (ISSC) for this logistics means of transport.
The party who imports this supply chain consignment.
A party that is an intermediate consignee for this supply chain consignment.
An invoicee trade party associated with this supply chain consignment.
A party that issues this specified declaration.
The loading inspection party for this logistics transport movement.
The party that loads this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The local party authorized to act for or on behalf of the consignee for this supply chain consignment.
The trade party providing the location for this document authentication.
A Non-Vessel Operating Common Carrier (NVOCC) carrier party for this logistics transport movement.
A party to be notified about this logistics transport movement.
The party that operates this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The operational responsible party for this communication event.
A trade party who is an operator of this product handling process.
The owner agent trade party for this logistics means of transport.
A party who owns this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A payee party for this header trade settlement.
The payer party for this header trade settlement.
The pick-up trade party for this supply chain consignment.
The provider party for this monitoring IOT device.
A trade party that receives this exchanged document.
A trade party requesting this referenced transport service.
A party requiring this specified usage condition.
A party responsible for providing this referenced transport service.
A party to be notified of the sailing advice for this logistics transport movement.
The party that sends this exchanged document.
A trade party providing services for this logistics means of transport.
The ship from party for this supply chain consignment.
A ship to party for this forecast delivery schedule.
A party specified for this experience event.
A stevedore party for this logistics transport movement.
A terminal operator party for this logistics transport movement.
The party which is the buyer of the transport services for this supply chain consignment.
The inspection party for the unloading of this logistics transport movement.
A party depositing goods in a warehouse for this supply chain consignment.
A party taking responsibility for goods stored in a warehouse for this supply chain consignment.
A party that operates a warehouse in which goods are stored for this supply chain consignment.
